alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 10 at 2:02PM MST until December 11 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, except 8 to 16 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. * WHERE...Lemhi Highlands, Centennial Mountains, and Island Park region. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Breezy conditions may create areas of blowing and drifting snow, especially over mountain passes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
